website_summaries.verdict: Despite some issues with quality, these are a great option if you’re looking for a good solar-powered light that lasts through the night.
pros: You get your choice of multi-colored, cold white, or warm white lights
Settings for medium or high brightness, or you can switch them off completely
Come on at sunset and last well into the night
cons: Some buyers report issues with quality, both in terms of lights failing and the durability of the fixtures themselves

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair and only one is working now. One of them only lasted 2 weeks before it just stopped working. The other one works fine. The light is not very bright but that's fine in my case since I use it to light the palm trees. I would give it 4 stars if both had been working still. Can't recommend it. **Update** Great customer service. The company reached out after my review and offered to send two more lights, which I accepted. The lights work just fine. I guess I had received a defective one. I want to commend the company for their quick response. I recommend the company and the product.
customer_reviews.author: R. G.

customer_reviews.title: Solar Powered Lights Work Great
customer_reviews.text: When I read the description of these solar powered lights it almost sounded "too good to be true." However I decided to take a chance by purchasing two lights and I have not been disappointed. Quite the contrary: these lights work exactly as advertised. The thing that I really like is that both the solar collector and the lights themselves are adjustable. You can move the solar collector over 180 degrees to capture the position of the sun. You can also adjust the direction of the lights. I have only had them in use for one week but thus far I am extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Peter M Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Dependable
customer_reviews.text: I really like these lights – they are bright and dependable. They light up my dark walk way without having to spend a ton of money on installation of electric lights. On sunny days (including partial sun) they get enough of a charge to stay on all night long. On cloudy days, the light stays on for less time, but still long enough to provide the light that I need. I will be buying some more for the back of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B

customer_reviews.title: almost too cool for my taste
customer_reviews.text: So much brighter than the earlier version(s). The light casts further and wider too. I'm back to buy more. Two observations that may be helpful: 1.) The white leds are very white ... almost too cool for my taste. But, it seems to work against my house. 2.). The bright white does not look good when shone on certain trees/plants. I have a red maple that looks an unnatural purple-green in its light. So, I moved it to highlight a different tree. You may want to try one of each (bright and warm) before committing to a larger purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AdH

customer_reviews.title: These lights are AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: Night and day difference!!! For what these lights are worth, they are exceptionally bright being only solar. Please see attached pictures. I'm only ashamed that I didn't purchase these sooner and wasted money on other cheap lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 month use
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these. On it's lowest setting, it doesn't display light all night long. It's also as if there is a short in them, at times I'm able to move the solar panel just a little bit and the light comes on. I shouldnt have to adjust them multiple times a week. These things are flaky. And now both of them have completely stopped working with a little over a month of them being in my yard. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Siren

customer_reviews.title: The Lights work Great on my Kneeling Marine/Soldier Memorial and on the Flag on my 20' Flagpole.
customer_reviews.text: I use the spotlights for a kneeling Marine/Soldier statue that is located in front of my flagpole and the other one for the flag. I set both on the lower level so that the lights will burn all night. My flagpole is 20' and the light on the lower level works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Presgrove

customer_reviews.title: Bonus
customer_reviews.text: Please buy these. They are amazing. The only thing that concerns me is theft.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J

customer_reviews.title: I’ve purchased this brand before and had good luck, but this is extremely disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I have not been able to use this product yet, but buyers should beware of what to expect when you open the box. The lights and other pieces were just loose in a plain white box. One light is damaged on the outer edge—which I can live with assuming it works. The other light was partially assembled, but broken. I’ve purchased this brand before and had good luck, but this is extremely disappointing. Also, the instructions say nothing about assembly, so I don’t think they are meant to be shipped as I received them.
customer_reviews.author: michelle garry

customer_reviews.title: At first I really liked these lights
customer_reviews.text: At first I really liked these lights. Meaning for the first couple weeks then one went out and then once a week one more went out until there are only 2 out of 13! They don't last. While they lasted they had a nice warm light and a good amount of light but how good is it if they don't keep working:( I am going to look into contacting manufacturer and seeing if there is anything they can do because we spent a lot of money for all these lights.
customer_reviews.author: amber k.

customer_reviews.title: Delivered broken and previously used
customer_reviews.text: I received this item and it was packaged well, a box inside an amazon box with the plastic air pillows. Opened the light box and observed one of the lights broken at the mounting knob for the solar screen. Both stakes has signs (dirt) of being previous used. I returned the set of lights. I hope if you ordered these, you don't get the ones I returned. I had obtained a set of these a couple years ago and they worked fine but not happy about receiving a returned damaged item.
customer_reviews.author: HPDretired

customer_reviews.title: Light up my life
customer_reviews.text: Excellent solar lights. I purchased these lights based off of helpful positive reviews and couldn't be happier about them. So bright I never use them on high as they are too bright, and I want to maximize run time. These lights are in a pretty heavily shaded yard as I have many trees but the large solar panels seem to gather enough light to run them from dusk all of the way to sunrise, about 7-8 hours. I build a gravel patio and fire pit in my back yard and needed some light just to make it back in a preciously pitch black yard without a flash light and these fit the purpose to a T.
customer_reviews.author: BaneTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: 2 year experience with over 10 lights
customer_reviews.text: Was impressed with light sensor, and warm white 200 lumens of 1st device I bought. New batteries only lasted 4-6hrs on high, but that was sufficient. Ultimately invested >$200 to light up entire landscaping. Daily battery diminished to 2-4hrs over 2yrs, and all batteries are dying at 2yrs. Not unexpected for lithium, so ordered replacement batteries. Unfortunately when I opened device to change batteries, I saw the majority of circuits were fried where the +red wire brings photoelectric charge from solar panel to circuit board. This is not acceptable - the complete investment is now trashed. I took a chance - I was wrong - don’t mane the same mistake - wait for better quality devices to come out.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good while they Last
customer_reviews.text: Obtained 6/7/18 and put into service. Worked extremely well, lighting to 8+ hours on low setting. No issues, always came on. Fast forward to 10/28/18, both lights would no longer light at night. Cycled power button to low and high without any success. Both just stopped working at the same time. Panels are clean and no leaks from rain. Characteristic of rechargeable battery failure however there was no weakening of light and two independent units failed at the exact same time. I would have thought the batteries could last longer cycling. Odd.
customer_reviews.author: Lorax

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Before using these I charged them for a week because it had been overcast and wanted to be sure they were properly charged. They lasted all night the 1st night on the low setting. The 2nd night they lasted 2 hours!! They were in sunlight all day before using them the 2nd night. I'm really disappointed! I know you get what you pay for but I read the reviews and for the most part they were great reviews. I guess you can't always believe what you read.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Quinton

customer_reviews.title: Very, very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This product is a big joke. I was so surprised when I opened the box it did not look as what was pictured on Amazon. What I got was chrome and clear looking, very flimsy & cheap looking. The spikes that came with it was covered with mud! Even the other parts were covered in dirt. SO it seems I was given a used item. How insulting. Tsk,tsk,tsk....just horrible. Returned and Refunded.
customer_reviews.author: Imelda

customer_reviews.title: Bright light ... easy to install ... good price ...
customer_reviews.text: Installed a few sets at my sister's house ... really made a difference. No more coming home to a dark house. It will be interesting to see how they hold up and how long they last.
customer_reviews.author: NancyG

customer_reviews.title: Great lights!!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these lights for a week but I love them so far! They get about 4-6 hours of sunlight and are brighter than I expected. I wish I would've ordered these before the other set that I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon H.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these and two have condensation inside them in less than a year of use. Update as at 5.1.17. All 4 of these lamps have moisture in them. While they are still currently working, i'm not expecting them to last Update at at 11/6/17 2 of the 4 lights have now failed. I disassembled them to find out why and it turns out that moisture got inside mine and corroded some of the internal components. I've written to CO a few times and so far they haven't offered to replace any of the defective units. Good lights if you don't need them to last
customer_reviews.author: Nick H

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy it while it lasts....
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and bought (2) set of two based on feedback. These lights worked great for another a month and then one went out. I blew it off as a defective one but at least I had three more. Fast forward to now and they all don't work and my time limit for returning or replacing the product has passed. I hate wasting money!!!!!!!! So, buy these knowing the life span is equivalent to a Mayfly. I did give two stars because when they did work they are very bright and last for many hours. It did a great job lighting up the scenery around the house.
customer_reviews.author: A. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Ddn't hold a charge long
customer_reviews.text: I have tried twice now to find solar lights for our FL home. I received these, followed the instructions, let them charge for 2 days. One day was partial sun the other was full sun. That night put them out. The lights have 2 setting, low and high. I set them for high. They came on around 9:30 (it was dark). So far so good. I must say they looked great. I want to bed. I got up around 2:00am to get something to drink. They were both out. I don't know how long they had been out. I was really looking for something that would last at least 8+ hours. I guess I will have o keep looking
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W. Rowan

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: The work very inconsistently. Some days some of them don’t turn on. Some days they do. Some days they last for several hours. Some days they are dim and barely last. It can’t possibly be due to sunlight differences, based on what days we had a lot of sun and how they functioned. Just cheap product. Don’t buy if you want durability and consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Pie

customer_reviews.title: spotlight
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I pulled the 1st spotlight from the box, adjusted the angle, pressed it in the worked up flower bed. As I was adjusting the angle of the spotlight, the hinge broke. I pulled out the 2nd spotlight being very careful and the 2nd one broke at the hinge. So very disappointed. This product is very weak at this hinge. The biggest disappointment today, I am unable to view my sign at night.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Dodds

customer_reviews.title: Good for utility light, but not for landscaping.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were a bit confusing, They say to take the packaging off the solar cells, and I expected there to be a sheet of plastic but there is nothing.I literally took them out of the box and plastic bag and put them in the ground. They are bright and work well. I had intended to use them for landscaping, to light the front of the house. The light they produce is bright but it is a cool light, so it looks funny when used for this purpose. The beam they produce is too focused, more of a spot light than a flood light. These would make good halloween lights, but for landscaping you need warm light.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great lights!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy w/this purchase. I got 2 in the warm white and 2 in the bright white to test out which I preferred. In my photo, the 2 shining up against the stone facade on the house are the bright white...they have a bit of a blue cast to them. The lights are situated about 1 ft from the wall. The other 2 lights in the warm white are shining against the blue planter and the white planter. This color more closely matches my porch lighting. I am pleasantly surprised at how bright they are, especially for solar lights. I'm in the 2nd year w/them and they are all still working well. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Verinia

customer_reviews.title: Nice lighting. (updated)
customer_reviews.text: (Dec 31, 2016) I like these much better that the bright white ones I had. Also, after a full day of sun, they seem to last pretty well ... but certainly not all night, even in a south-eastern winter. Time will tell how they do during a south-eastern summer. UPDATE (Mar 30, 2016): the days are getting longer (and brighter) and I'm pleasantly surprised to learn that they DO last all night given a good sunny day. Have one pointing at our lawn statue of St. Francis and the other at our house number. I think I'll be getting another set for the pool area. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Baker

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 8 months..not worth it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review about 8 months after ordering the item. I wanted to determine the longevity of this product. I am disappointed to say that this item has not lasted beyond this review. I placed an order in February 2020. I really liked how bright it displayed at night in my garden and it was beautiful lighting BUT about a week ago, one light went out and last night another light went out. I’m super annoyed because if it did have longevity, this would be an excellent product for solar outdoor lighting. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky H

customer_reviews.title: These are good summertime lights; they're not so good when the days get cloudy and the nights cold
customer_reviews.text: I was ready to give this a five-star rating a couple of weeks ago, but I have to drop it to three. I bought the lights to illuminate my American flag at night. When the days were long and the sun bright, they would come on at dark and burn the whole night long. In fact they worked so well, I moved one to light up my driveway, leaving one for the flag. Unfortunately, we're entering the era of gray skies, cold temps and long nights. They are barely lasting two or three hours now. If you buy them in the summertime, you'll love 'em. If you buy them now, you might be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ksteinhoff

customer_reviews.title: Lasted outdoors year round
customer_reviews.text: I have had these lights for almost 4 years - they stay outdoors year round, and I'm just now replacing one... only because my three year old stepped on it for about the 5th time and it finally broke! They are super easy, just push them into the ground and point them where you want them. And very bright! I use them as uplights on my front door. They look so nice and fancy, without the expensive project of getting outdoor wiring placed for permanent light fixtures. Plus, you can move them any time you want. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: lisscr

customer_reviews.title: Liked them so much I bought six more!!
customer_reviews.text: Have several of these in my garden and pointed at my palm trees......Looks FANTASTIC. Great quality and very clear and bright LEDs. UPDATE: The garden has become my favorite past time and these lights show off how great it looks all night! PS: I had purchased some other lights that look pretty much the same but two of the four died in three months. I have had NO ISSUES with these lights from URPOWER and will be using them for all of my solar light needs.
customer_reviews.author: SLBFLA

customer_reviews.title: Take your chances - not weather proof, lasted less than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: 5/10/20 update: These are not meant to last outdoors. I bought 24 of them thinking that they’d last a few years. I’ve had 10 go bad and another 10 that haven’t go yellow on the lens, and one only have one of the 4 LED lights work. The other 3 are replacements from the vendor that are 6 months old. 2019 review. Bought a pair in August. The inside rusted and was useless. $26 thrown in the trash. Can’t get refund from Amazon because it’s been longer than 30 days. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: NJD & DMD

customer_reviews.title: These are The Best EVER
customer_reviews.text: I bought these about 2-3 years ago and have since purchased about 4 more pairs or so...gave one as a gift and that person loves them, too. They're bright, last long into the night, and are reliable. NOTHING I've ever had before works as these do. I go through a lot of solar lights in my large yard since I have chickens and live on a wood preserve. I need things bright and reliable. I also have two pointed on the front of my house. These are the only lights I can solidly recommend to work that way. Just make sure they're getting enough sun and you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights
customer_reviews.text: These lights were purchased to light up the front of our home at night and they work great. We've purchased them before and in 2 years have only had to replace one out of 4 so far. They come pre-charged enough so you can set them up right away. They really make the house look nice, shine on our flag and our house number as well as lighting up the darker gate side of the house showing the beware of dog sign. Would definably by more. I would have given them 5 stars but I'm old school and 2 years doesn't seem like a long enough life span.
customer_reviews.author: Marmom

customer_reviews.title: Faulty lights
customer_reviews.text: I was so looking forward to having these lights to shine on Halloween decorations that I have in my windows. The reviews sounded promising. I've bought a total of 3 sets of these lights. One set had a broken light at the hinge when it arrived. The other set, only one light worked for a short time. The other light would come on, but turn off in about an hour. The last set works, but only if it isn't cloudy or it doesn't rain. Either I had a bad batch or this product is faulty and not properly tested and checked before shipping.
customer_reviews.author: jenham

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: I live in Bakersfield, CA, so we get a decent amount of sunlight. I have two under two-year olds and from what I've noticed, full sunlight for the day will get the lights to last the entire night (6 am and they were still on, on the brightest setting). Another one in a less advantageous position (probably 4-6 hours of direct sunlight and 2-4 hours of indirect sunlight) gets it to go from 6:30 pm to about 4 am on the bright setting. The lights are fairly bright. Bright enough to read by and honestly, if you had enough in the right places, probably enough to play basketball to. I will try and keep track of how long these last.
customer_reviews.author: JY

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting batteries and powerful light
customer_reviews.text: Light is so powerful, I use the low setting for both. One lights the entire front of the house, the other the back. I have lots of other lights in driveway and walkways, and they all died. The batteries are not strong, and the solar panels are barely adequate for charging. But these lights have big solar panels that completely recharge on a cloudy day. The batteries last forever. They work every day, providing light without fail, and the batteries are going strong. Only problem I have is with the coating they put on the solar panel. It doesn't last. But the solar panels last, so I don't care.
customer_reviews.author: Jedidiah

customer_reviews.title: Day one review
customer_reviews.text: I just received today and must say I’m impressed. Great warm light color, very bright even on the dim setting. They can really cast light a good distance. The ability to adjust the light angle and the solar panel angle are nice. My first concern is the durability, they are plastic. A loose basket ball could destroy one, but at the price point they are reasonable. My next concern is the battery life, how will they hold up after a year of use? Note: photos are in dim setting, phone camera doesn’t quite do justice, actual results are better. I bought 4 to test out. I think I’ll buy four more to complete my front yard.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Last over 8 hours after a Year
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't do reviews but these, OH YES. So I have bought many solar lights at the big stores but NONE compare to these. In fact, I have 4 working still from the big store that I'm tossing and replacing with these. The others cast a Yellow light. I bought a Colored set of 4 a year ago and they still come on after sunset and last to almost sunrise. My others from the big store, they last only few hours after sunset. I won't purchase any other lights after having the colored ones in Florida Heat and Rain for over a year and they are STILL WORKING after 8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey H

customer_reviews.title: Plan To Replace Every 1-2 Years
customer_reviews.text: These don't hold up to Georgia, USA weather real well. I made multiple purchases of URPOWER lights. Those that are two years old are beginning to fail. There's a plastic film protecting the solar cells and it is flaking off around the edges. I've had two that failed completely, even after replacing the battery with a fully charged battery. Those that are 10 months old have traces of the same flaking of the protective layer and I expect them to last about as long as the first bunch.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kleinfelter

customer_reviews.title: These are the best!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many solar lights but none are as good as these. I have the color changing model which is as a bonus is great for detouring deer from my garden. It's not 100% but it really helps and they look beautiful. I keep buying more because they work so well. I probably have over 26 by now. Im in NY so they don't always last the garage winter. I think I've had to throw away 4-6 of them when they stop working, but still highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: VI

customer_reviews.title: Not So Bright
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to think these solar-based lights would cast much light but thought I'd try them anyway. I am sorry I did, as complete darkness barely allows these to reveal much of what they are shining upon (in my case, 20 foot thick pine trees). I can blame the Michigan weather--lack of of lot of sunshine to feed their solar batteries I guess--but I've had patio lights before that seemed to be brighter than these.
customer_reviews.author: Rockinroller

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed Amazon customer...again.
customer_reviews.text: I live in South Florida. I guess the sun, which these lights are powered from, is TOO strong. I purchased thees on September 30, 2019. My husband installed them over our screened in pool patio with direct full sun a few days later. Well after 5 months, I have to report, one of the two lights purchased has stopped working. I tried to look for some kind of warranty, but found none! Another poorly made Chines import. Lets go back to the good old made in the USA products. At least there would be someone to talk to about this. Very upset and disappointed Amazon consumer, as there is NO contact information to seek help.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Sekowski

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating Experience 1/30/18 UPDATE added
customer_reviews.text: Received a two-pack about a week ago. Placed them outside in full sun or a full two days so they could be charged. Switched them on to “low” light setting. One worked for 2 nights, and then stopped working. The second one worked for 3 nights and stopped working. Very frustrating. Going to keep these a couple more days to see if I can get them to work. Otherwise, I plan on returning these and look for a better quality product. 1/30/18 UPDATE: Both Lights finally seem to be working properly. They seem to be holding a charge and have turned on for 4 consecutive nights. Crossing my fingers.
customer_reviews.author: William M. Demmon

customer_reviews.title: When they work, they're great -- but just stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I used to love these solar lights -- over the past few years I've bought 5 pairs and reviewed them enthusiastically, but one from the most recent set (ordered a month ago) suddenly stopped working, for no apparent reason. So sorry not to be able to give a positive review as I did in the past. When they work, they're great. The return window closed in a little under a month and there doesn't seem to be a way to contact the seller to see if there's a way to remedy the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but Brittle
customer_reviews.text: 12/2/19 Update - Changing to 2 stars. Out of the 4 boxes (8 devices) purchased 3 have already broken. Product needs to be hardened and improved. This is a basic cheap residential class of lighting. I was hoping for something more commercial. Overall, simply disappointed. One has already snapped from the hing. Being stuck in the landscape it is easy for these to take unexpected abuse. One has already snapped from the base. Brightness is decent. They could use some hardening & thicker build.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright Solar Lights!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying solar lights, since they mostly fizzled after 2-3 hours, and usually not that bright as advertised. These small and compact solar lights are very bright and first time I left them to charge, roughly 2 hours in the sun. But, I noticed how bright they were and they lasted for several hours. I fell asleep and they were still on at 2 am in the morning. My guess is they were on until dawn, with only a couple of charge time. What a big surprise! I cannot give more than 5 stars, but if I can, I'll give it 10!
customer_reviews.author: Erik2024

customer_reviews.title: Both are dead after 8 months. Didn't last long enough during the night.
customer_reviews.text: Update: At around 8 months both of these lights died. The seam around the solar panel is not sealed, so there was some oxidation inside the compartment with the circuit board and batteries. I'm not sure if the battery is dead or if it's the circuit board. Annoyingly, the rechargeable battery is some weird size that is not common. I'm disappointed in this product. Original: It can last nearly the whole night if you have it in full bright sun the entire day and no shade. If it's overcast and in shade for a few hours and you have it on the low brightness setting, expect 3-4 hours.
customer_reviews.author: this_guy

customer_reviews.title: NOT Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I have had 3 of these lights fail do to water intrusion, see photos, one shows how I have installed these lights, the other photo shows the 4th failure with solar panel opened to find water ( they may call it condensation) and this has caused corrosion of the wires at soldered connections, thus failure of the product. The brochure that comes with the lights states Temperature difference may lead to the condensation of water vapor BUT this will not affect the performance, this is not the case, they DO NOT perform as a result of this condensation. There is no gasket or seal to prevent water from entering the solar /battery assembly.
customer_reviews.author: H. Balsak

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these lights twice. First time, one of the lights broken in the box when I opened the package, no damage to the package. I returned those and ordered again right away. The second box of lights was fine so I charged them as directed in the instructions and put them outside. The light they produced was almost undetectable. When my husband tried adjusting the solar panel on one of the lights, it broke in exactly the same place as the one that was broken in the box. I’m giving up on these lights and strongly recommending that you look for a different product.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Faithful Little Sentinels
customer_reviews.text: We bought these lights to help light the back stretch of grass I take my dog on each night before she goes to bed. While they are not intended to light up as large an area as we have, they do cast two cheerful, bright streams of light that are already on while we wait for our motion sensor lights to come to life. They were very easy for even non-mechanically minded folks like us to put together, and their little solar panels always keep the lights on once the sun goes down.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Labovitz

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof!!  Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 2 pack of these lights for lighting my flag at night. One failed completely in 3 months. I checked the battery voltage and it was only 2.5 vdc (it should be 3.7). It was placed in an area with a southern exposure where it received abundant sunlight. Disappointing Update, I lost the 2nd light in 14 months. When I opened it up to check the battery water poured out of it. The board was completely corroded. I think there are better choices.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Dill

customer_reviews.title: Bright and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: We added these lights to a new tree that was planted several years after our landscaping lighting was done. Before we opted to do a more complicated installation we decided to see if these lights would work. They fit the bill for us! The lights are bright and set the tree off very well. We selected the warm white and the color blends well with our professionally installed landscape lighting. We will probably purchase more for some other unlit spaces.
customer_reviews.author: GalsJ

customer_reviews.title: BRIGHT WHITE
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good, very bright, last almost all night after a full charge. They are VERY VERY WHITE. We were hoping for more a warmer white, but it's bright and there are no filters that come with them. You can get some film and put it over top to tone it down a little. Over all very happy, just wish it came with some filters or options for warmer colors. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Yoyodyne Propulsion Systems

customer_reviews.title: Love IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We initially bought 2 and wen and go 2 more. These lights are terrific! We had just put up a flag pole and wanted to have a light on it at night, so we put one of them right under the pole and shown it straight up the flag pole. The picture it made was awesome. This light has low and high beam and we used the low for the flag. We also live by a lake and we needed bright light on the pier and this light works great, the whole pier and walkway are well lit up. The other 2 are used in the driveway and backyard. So far we love it...
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Horrible yellow color
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this type of solar led before. They come in different kelvin (warm-cool) colors. This one is horrible. They have just taken the sunlight led's and put a yellow lens in front of it. Other brands use a WARM led light. My garden has jaundice. Plus one failed right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Rancho Guy 4

customer_reviews.title: Very bright - great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these at first just to see if I would like them to light up my front yard landscape - which BTW is not much! But they worked so well and were so nice and bright I decided to purchase 6 more to place around the landscape and add lighting to my palms and bushes to make it look so much nicer at night! These lights are great! Let them charge right out of the box in the sun for 8 hrs then press once for low light and twice for bright light! I keep mine on low light and its bright enough! Rain and sprinklers have not bothered the function.
customer_reviews.author: Missy Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: These are BRIGHT! Started with 2, now have 10
customer_reviews.text: Ordered six. Decided to try two before committing to all of them. Long story, short: I have ordered four more for a total of ten. These are very bright and make a huge difference in the look of my house and spotlighted palm trees. To have had these all professionally bought and installed would have cost at least $3,000 or more, here in Florida. You won’t be disappointed if you make sure the solar panels get enough sun.
customer_reviews.author: WPFLreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Light up the front of my house exactly the way I wanted them to.  I hope they last!
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly how described. Seem to be pretty well made. I just hope they last through the seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Talamascaa

customer_reviews.title: Good, as long as you don't need the light to move side to side
customer_reviews.text: They work well and they seem to be of good quality. 3 stars because the light head and solar collector do not pivot side to side, only up and down. I had hoped to mount it on a wall, but the light would only shine in a line straight out from where it's mounted. You can't move the light side to side. In the ground or on a wall, you have to install it such that it's pointing at what you want to light up and that's OK, but be aware that the solar collector is facing the same direction as the light, you may not get full sun on the collector.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew G.

customer_reviews.title: Good, bright lights; Great for yard lighting.
customer_reviews.text: These are great lights for yard lighting. I am not sure if they are bright enough for security purposes, but lighting up trees or landscaping walls, they are great. They put out a nice warm light. The solar cells/batteries seem to have sufficient capacity to easily last through the entire night. The reason I am holding off a '5' rating is that both the light and the solar panel can only be moved up and down and not side to side. This imposes some limits on how you can position the lights relative to the panel. The lights are built sturdily and look quite durable.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kumar

customer_reviews.title: A MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, LOVE LOVE. I've bought solar light for many years and yes have returned some that didn't perform what they claimed. I could kick myself now because I bought these recently with an Amazon discount. I had just returned a solar light that claimed to run all night and they actually lasted less than cheaper versions I've bought in the past so I didn't want to order too many and now I regret it. These lights light up my garden like no others and when I went back to order more they no longer offered the discount. These are great and a must buy if you like your garden lite up...don't order too few if they're on sale.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyBeverlyHIlls

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these lights twice and am very happy with them. I use them for illuminating some "major" trees, bushes, and flowers in my landscape at night. They are nice and bright (which creates a nice contrast with some other lights I have that are dimmer and used for lesser important areas of the garden), and it is very nice that the solar panel is fully adjustable in order to get the most sunlight. They are also sturdy, with nice sized posts, and withstand getting bumped by the dogs.
customer_reviews.author: L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Light lasts all night and turns on/off perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. One sits out in the sunlight all day (I'm in Arizona so there's lots of it) and the other is under a tree to light up the tree at night. Both have performed very well. The solar light that sits in the sunlight lights up all night long and has been very effective at turning on at dusk. Quite candidly I didn't know if the one under a tree would light up at all but it does every night at dusk. The light burns about half the night and since it's only lighting up the underside of a tree, I am very pleased with that! These are good buys given the price and very effective.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. D123

customer_reviews.title: WELL MADE
customer_reviews.text: BRIGHT, USEFUL, PLUG AND PLAY DEVICE THAT WORKS WELL I RUN AN AMERICAN FLAG AT MY HOME 24/7 SINCE MY BIRTHDAY ON SEPTEMBER 11TH 2001. THIS FLAG IS LIT AT NIGHT BY FLOOD LIGHTS CONTROLLED BY PHOTO CELLS. THE LED UNITS WERE AN EXPERIMENT TO AUGMENT THE STANDARD FLAG LIGHTS AND THEY ARE VERY EFFECTIVE. I DECIDED TO WAIT AWHILE BEFORE OFFERING A REVIEW... THEY ARE FLAWLESS SO FAR AND LAST A GOOD 8 HOURS AFTER SUNDOWN. THEY CANNOT BE USED FOR FULL DUSK TO DAWN OPERATION BUT GOOD FOR REALLY NICE AUGMENTATION LIGHTING!
customer_reviews.author: CONSUMER PRO

customer_reviews.title: Best Solar Lights We've Had
customer_reviews.text: We use these solar lights at the end of our driveway uplighting 2 Japanese Maples and our name/address sign. This is the 3rd set we've purchased. We bought a set to use as uplights for our Christmas Nativity scene & some retro Christmas hymnals & a "Jesus is the Reason for the Season" Christmas banner on our fence facing the road. Another set we bought for my Mom and Dad along the steps to their home, they LOVE these lights as much as we do. They're sturdy, durable as heck (our original set is 3 years old and going strong) and we like the warm colored ones. Highly recommend. They're the only ones we'll use.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Product exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: Super pleased with the quality of the lights and how quickly the lights arrived -- ordered and received in two days. They also are super easy to set up. The light and the solar sensor can be separately adjusted as each has a separate adjustable knob -- one for the light and one for the solar sensor. This allows you to make adjustments to the solar sensor to maximize the amount of sunlight hitting the screen without having to move the light. I purchased the soft white lights and was impressed with how bright they are. In fact, I liked them so much that I bought another set the very next day and they also arrived within two days.
customer_reviews.author: Sagacious Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a powerful solar light & here it is!!! I have it on low & it lasts the whole evening!!! I decided to face one up to shine on the American flag & it looks awesome! What a find!!!! I have purchased solar lights before BUT these are the most powerful ones I have found yet!!! Don't hesitate ...if you are looking for powerful & long lasting solar lights.....these are for you! Very happy customer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Loy

customer_reviews.title: Good light output, does not swivel for aiming.
customer_reviews.text: Good light output. On a full sunny winter day will charge battery enough to run past midnight. On a fully cloudy winter day might not last until midnight. Light head and solar panel only tilts up and down. If you are mounting it on the ground to point up it should be a great light. I was trying to mount it high on a fence and point down into the yard. Didn't have enough adjustment to make it work like I wanted. In that position I can't tilt the solar panel to get maximum exposure to sun. So not good for my application.
customer_reviews.author: V. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Great value, but be sure to check color temperature (cool vs warm) to make sure you get the right one for your needs
customer_reviews.text: These are surprisingly bright and work flawlessly: they seem like a great value. That said, the item description would really benefit from some clarity about the color temperature of the lights: these are very cool / blue-ish, which does not look good with some types of foliage and vegetation, IMHO. Be aware that URPOWER also sells a warm white version of these lights... which I wish I had realized before ordering. These have a very sterile/clinical color cast, which clashes with the warmer lights I am already using and doesn't flatter the types of foliage in my yard.
customer_reviews.author: bbfla

customer_reviews.title: Great lights that last the whole night.  Update 2 Years Later.
customer_reviews.text: Great lights, have a warm color, and two brightness levels. I've been using them outside in Hawaii for 4 months, and they're still going strong. I'll be buying a few more of them. My update is this. Both of these lights have stopped working. They just didn't hold up to the elements here in Hawaii. I don't know if it was too much sun (the solar panels are both bubbled), or the 70" of rain annually where I live, but they've both died. On the otherhand, the Keynice Waterproof IP65 light that I bought is still running like a champ, and visually has held up much better. The Keynice also had a much sturdier feel.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph T. Allen

customer_reviews.title: 2.5 year later review - 1 out of 2 working
customer_reviews.text: One of the two lights I purchased stopped working. I took off the back cover and did some probe testing with a voltmeter and it looks like the solar panel is not charging the battery. The solar panel itself seems to be working as well as the light, but the charge control gave up. Was hoping it was just the battery, but unfortunately the innards are broken making it unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Perkins

customer_reviews.title: They break so easily...
customer_reviews.text: I tried to stab the stake of 1 of these into the ground, which was pretty loose dirt where I was putting it, & it just SNAPPED at the juncture of the hinge & the lamp itself, as if the thing were made of tissue paper! I've been very gentle w/ the other ones, & they DO hold up through winter, in below-freezing temperatures, though I haven't tried them in subzero temperatures. I'll probably buy them again, but at about $15 per light, it's not worth it to buy them & use them as intended, lol. -Account holder's daughter
customer_reviews.author: Irving Drew

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting / bright / great lights
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in November of last year and they sat in 2-3 feet of snow a pretty good chunk of the winter. They worked flawlessly until one died a couple weeks ago (after 5-6 months) - I occasionally pulled them out of the heavy snow because obviously under several inches of snow they didn't get enough sun. Spring is here and I'm delighted to have these now for good weather. I just bought a battery charger - the batteries are rechargeable and come out easily with a Phillips head screwdriver. Also purchased two more because I like them so much. Light is very bright / several angles can be set - very reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Worked, One Didn't
customer_reviews.text: I have a long driveway that can't be plowed in the winter and I have to walk down through the snow after dark. I nailed one of these to a tree at the top of the driveway and once I had it on the right setting, it worked, and continues to work great. It does give off a significant amount of light. The second one, which I nailed to a tree at the bottom of the driveway, worked for maybe two days. Because it worked at one time, I know I have it on the correct setting but it's not doing diddlysquat. Fifty percent successful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonia

customer_reviews.title: Low grade plastic - Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and worked well for a while. The plastic material was not designed to take a beating from the sun. The casing on both of the units I purchased cracked, the clear cover over solar panel faded and changed colors and eventually stopped working. Under 2 years time, both units ended up in the recycle bin. If these were cheaper, my expectations would have been lower and perhaps I would have posted a decent review...
customer_reviews.author: Hoggie

customer_reviews.title: Very good light with some limitations
customer_reviews.text: I live in the Southwest so there is plenty of sunshine to recharge the batteries. The lights work well. They are bright enough for my purposes (lighting front walk and parking area of driveway) on the low setting (there are two settings: low and high). The one design flaw is that the solar panel faces the same direction as the light, which means the light needs to be facing south, give or take several degrees to the southwest or southeast, for optimal solar collection. The solar panel can be adjusted between horizontal and vertical but not for direction. So if you need south-facing light, I would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Cap'm Don Juan

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: These lights look nice and charge well once you get a good place with a decent amount of sunlight. I have bought ten of these and have had 3 fail due to water intrusion. I am not sure how the water even gets inside, but when I disassemble, the interior circuitry is drenched. I have had luck drying a couple out, but at over $15/ light I would expect these to perform better.
customer_reviews.author: John H. Bockius III

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Warm Lights .. For JUST a Couple of Months
customer_reviews.text: These lights work remarkably well putting out a bright yet natural warm light at our garden. At first, we purchased 2 sets (4 lights) to start our landscaping project. We loved them so much, we winded up buying 3 sets more! The problem is that THEY DON’T LAST! Some of them stopped working after a couple of months of use. We purchased a few more to replace the broken ones, and again ... they began to a couple of months later. I think this is unfortunate, especially given the price. So don’t waste your money. We will definitely stop buying these and try with another brand to see if they last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jess V.

customer_reviews.title: Love these things!
customer_reviews.text: About 50% of my Amazon purchases are solar lights. Step, path, flood and spot. I have bought a dozen of these over the years to highlight trees along my driveway and they get better ever hear. Shove into the ground and forget about them. I also leave them in during Connecticut winters and they come on under the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Victor R.

customer_reviews.title: Way beyond expectations
customer_reviews.text: Totally surprised that these work especially since they are so inexpensive. I got the soft more yellow light and have them under trees in the yard and it looks as good as my neighbors who paid thousands to have electricity installed for his lights. The only thing that would make them better is if they were just a bit stronger to light the tree a bit higher but absolutely no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect illumination for Halloween displays!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these lights to light up some tombstones for Halloween. They were easy to set up and the provide to perfect light at low power. The soft white light is almost yellow and couldn't be better. After Halloween I'll switch to high power and us them to light up the landscape. They were easy to set up and worked just as advertised. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Commander Bill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, stirdy and long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: I bought them almost a year ago now and they have been out in my yard since.. They got exposed to rain, drizzle from watering lawn daily, heat up to 125 degrees and direct sun and still they work as a charm. I live on the tropics, so 12 hours of light and 12 hours of darkness without much seasonal variations and still a year later they keep their charge till around midnight (from 6pm).. Good product!!!
customer_reviews.author: N. Aoun

customer_reviews.title: These lights are great for highlighting trees at night or lighting the address number on house.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these spotlights and am very happy with them. After the initial charging before first use, I found them really easy to assemble and anchor in the ground for highlighting our dogwood tree in the backyard and for lighting up the house number on the front of our house so easier to locate our address in the dark. Great product for price...I hope they will last...can't comment on that yet, but will post something a year from now if still going strong! Great product. Emily, Palo Alto California
customer_reviews.author: Emily Risberg

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Work Great
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to light up two Christmas Palms in large planters by the pool. I have one light in each planter and they look great. With the close proximity, I can't tell much difference between medium and bright, so I leave them on the lower setting. These definitely put out plenty of light. These areas don't get full sun for very long, but still get enough of a charge to last about 8 hours or so each night. I was surprised to wake up at 4am to find them still on. They turn on and off automatically when they sense light just as advertised. Planning to get some warm ones for the landscaping in the front of my house.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: These lights exceeded my expectations. After one week in operation they are performing exactly as I hoped. I use them to illuminate a business sign at the entrance. Low power is plenty and lasts all night. High power is even better. I need to see if they would make it through the night on high here in the northeast with less daylight and more hours of darkness during winter. These are a great value. The cost of running power out to the entrance sign far outweighs inexpensive solar lights even if they only last a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: Bright Spotlight
customer_reviews.text: Using this to spotlight a feature in my garden. Easy to install, has high and ow settings and capability to position and lock both light and solar panel into position. even the low light setting is very bright. Gave a 5, but would love if they could design for a feature that doesn't exist..would love if the solar panel could be positioned left and right as well as up and down. would be helpful in difficult placement situations.
customer_reviews.author: Pat D.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR$
customer_reviews.text: Only one of the two lights actually works. I attribute this to a faulty on/off switch design. It is a push button for 3 settings. There is NO way to tell if you are turning the thing on or high or low. Since you have to charge the thing for 8 hours, it becomes a trial and error thing,which is ludicrous. DO NOT WASTE YOUR$
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Chun CPA

customer_reviews.title: Bright but fragile
customer_reviews.text: We are purchasing a range of lights with white hues on the architecture and yellow on the vegitation. Out of 4 brands this is the best yellow hue light with the best brightness we have found. But as you can see after moving the light 3 times, it snapped. I tried to duct tape it, but that didn't work. I'm going the seller will send me a planter stick and the world will be right. Easy to assemble. Be gentle implanting in ground. I really want to give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Effervescence

customer_reviews.title: Good while they lasted..
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these two years ago and unfortunately they are all starting to die. They aren’t as bright as they used to be, even with routine cleaning maintenance. One is fully dead and won’t light anymore. A bit frustrated I thought these were a little better quality than that. I guess they’re good if you plan on replacing them every 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: quinncm

customer_reviews.title: Luck of the Draw
customer_reviews.text: The other reviewers mentioned that the switch in the back having actual positions, but mine came with a push button that toggles among the various settings. It's impossible for me to know which setting I am currently on. Two weeks after installing them in my yard, only one of them remains functional. Buy a pair if you feel lucky.
customer_reviews.author: satchmo

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: So far, these are great. Just received them...charged them for 8-hours in the sun and turned them on. They work perfectly and come completely assembled. Just pop them in the ground. They have a button that you press once for low, again for high, and a third time if you want to turn them off. The angle is fully and easily adjustable. They are plastic, but seem very well made. From the other reviews, I expect they will last a long time. I will try to remember to update in a while to let you know. Until then...quite happy with this purchase and will probably purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Housewife

customer_reviews.title: All good things come to an end
customer_reviews.text: Well I guess for 5 months they were great. Pointed at my tree and gave a great glow but all good things must come to an end. One of them is longer working however the other one is still going.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Guerra

customer_reviews.title: These are too soft and aren't great for security purposes
customer_reviews.text: This wasn't exactly what I was looking for. I purchased this to replace the spot lights that I previously had in my yard. The light isn't bright enough and the coverage just isn't there. I had the spot lights that were somewhat yellow or orange. It gave it a more warm feel and it truly lit up my yard and house. These are too soft and aren't great for security purposes, if that's what you're going for. If you're looking to just light a path on the driveway, then this may work. One of the lights also works at random. Depends on the day, and I've only had this for about 1 week. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Nieves

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I selected the lights with the softer lighting and it is perfect for my front walkway towards the front door, not glaring white but soft. It's nice, just what I wanted. I also had the opportunity to use one of the lights indoors. Our power went out due to a bad storm, brought the light indoors and pointed it toward the living room ceiling, it illuminated the room fully with no need of candles or lanterns. It worked out very well. The pair of lights are in perfect condition and arrived in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: These are the real deal
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 2 other sets of solar lights and always been unhappy. HOWEVER, these are really great. I was up at 4 AM last night getting a drink and I noticed that these were still on. Of course, the light duration will depend upon how much sun they get to charge, and I've definitely noticed that they can turn off closer to midnight if the day has been overcast. However, for the money, I'd recommend these as being reliable and bright.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Its not really an issue and would still recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: These work really well! I bought them to help aluminate the street numbers at night which is difficult for visitors to read. The install is as simple as stabbing it in the ground and adjusting the angle of the solar panel. My only complaint is the photo sensor location or the shut off time when it sees light. My first location resulted with it shutting off the at the first hint of lights from our vehicle's headlights. So I had to play around a few times to get to set up so that the panel gets light and it stayed on when anyone drives close to it. Its not really an issue and would still recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond H.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile solar product for wall-mount or in-ground installation with bright LED lights and back-up battery.
customer_reviews.text: After reading the glowing reviews, I purchased these outdoor LED lights and very happy with the decision. I initially purchased (4) sets. Upon installation, I was so pleased with the brightness of the lights, ease of use, install versatility (wall or in-ground) hence decided to purchase (2) more sets. The lights were well-packaged and also included the necessary hardware for wall-mount installation. The instructions were clear and concise. Great product. I'll update the review in a few months once I witness its operation during wintertime.
customer_reviews.author: Kaysha

customer_reviews.title: Using to light a sign at night.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these lights to illuminate a 3 foot by 5 foot double sided sign in front of my business. On the low power they do well for the for the center of the sign (one on each side of the sign) but the sides are still in dim light. On high, the light is enough to read the sign from 25 feet away, but the lights only last about 4 hours. On low power they last a little under 8 hours. Two lights on each side would do perfect I feel. If these lights were being used as advertised for landscape lighting, I truly believe they would be very good for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful lights....love the adjustable solar panels and light angles.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful spot lights. I didn't see any protective film over the panels, and after reading the questions and reviews, I checked again but still didn't see anything. These lights work great and I really like that there are two different settings. Added bonuses....the way the spikes are designed, they don't twist or rotate when you put them in the ground. I also like that you can adjust the angles of the lights and panels. It allows you to get the optimal position for sunlight and the best angle for lighting at the same time...best of both worlds.
customer_reviews.author: thaihoney

customer_reviews.title: ... 2 2 packs of this item and they are AWESOME. Way brighter than any other solar spotlight I ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 2 packs of this item and they are AWESOME. Way brighter than any other solar spotlight I have seen, and I have bought 2 other brands. These lights are quite "cool blue/white" in color, so beware of that. My reason for 4 stars is that of the 4 lights I bought, 1 was defective. It worked on night 1 and then never turned on again. I contacted customer support and they quickly refunded me so I could buy a replacement. They also offered to pay for overnight shipping, but that seemed a little wasteful. I plan to buy more of these for my backyard soon.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Washburn

product_meta.title: URPOWER Solar Lights, 2-in-1 Waterproof 4 LED Solar Spotlight Adjustable Wall Light Landscape Light Security Lighting Dark Sensing Auto On/Off for Patio Deck Yard Garden Driveway Pool Area(2 Pack)
product_meta.description:
Color:Cool White

Tips:
Please confirm the switch is under "on" status so that the light could be charged normally and auto lights on at night.
If the ground is too hard, do not twist or hammer it with force. Try to soften the ground with water and then insert into the ground.

Description:
The latest technology for beautiful, high-tech landscaping would be these In-ground Lights. During the daytime, they are retracted, and absorbing solar energy. At dusk, they literally pop up and light up, giving you lights along a pathway, driveway, deck or dock that aren't in your way during the day.Includes installation hardware, completely wireless. Powered by a lithium ion rechargeable battery that's solar powered - each light illuminates via 4 LEDs. Completely weather resistant. Each light works independently.

Specifications:
Waterproof level: IP64
Charging time:4-5 hours
Working time: about 6 - 9 hours
Rechargeable Battery: 3.7V 2200mAh
Dimensions:29*9.5*34 cm
Power Source: Solar-Powered

Features:
2 modes - high light mode & dim light mode
No wiring required - simply install and enjoy
Great for landscapes, grass area, decks, docks, and more
Solar-Powered, Low Voltage, Stake or Hang, Automatic
Adjusted 270 degrees up or down (180 degree for the solar panel, 90 degree for the light head)
Winter weather resistant- you can leave these out all year long
Prior to first use, leave the light charge for two sunny days let the battery charge fully

Package includes:
2 * Solar In-ground Light
2 * Spike
2 * Manual
6 * Screws
feature_bullets: URPOWER 3rd Generation solar outdoor spotlights,rechargeable and adjustable solar wall lights / In-Ground Lights, easy to install with no tools.
Fully Adjustable Light & Solar Panel - Adjust the light angle to illuminate the perfect spot and adjust the solar panel angle for optimum sun exposure.
2 in 1 Functions - Stick into the ground./Use included screws to mount on the wall.
Unique solution in landscape and outdoor lighting,Powered by rechargeable battery that's solar powered.

Automated Switch - Auto on at night / Auto off at sunrise.2 modes(high/low).4 bright LED Bulbs, 50 Lumens in Each LED, 200 Lumens in total 4 LED,Built-in rechargeable battery(2200mAh). Light up 6-9 hours after fully charged.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars10,697 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
